revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 61:;Harpagathes, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Tasiaipis, drachmas 20;;Sempronia Diodora (Isiaina);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 42 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 6, naubion drachmas obol 1.50, surcharges drachmas 10 obols 3.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 96 obols 26) eparourion drachmas 28 obols 2, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos drachma 1 obol 0.5, in total drachmas 95 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 2 obols 4, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas drachmas 3 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Satabous, mother Heras, drachmas 8;;Claudius Apolinarios through the agency of Serenos (Titilla);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 13 obols 5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obol 1, naubion drachma 1 obol 2, surcharges drachmas 3 obol 3;;(in left margin: drachmas 44) eparourion drachmas 9 obols 2, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 3 chalki 2, in total drachmas 31 obols 3 chalki 2;;other orchard taxes apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2; naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obl 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Sarapion, son of Apollonios, grandson of Harpagathes, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Phaesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanais, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpakysis, grandson of Satabous, mother Tasokonopis, drachmas 12;;in total for the day drachmas 292 obols 26;;(Pachon) 13 likewise:;Kasia Sarapias (Baukalas);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 25 obols 3.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 3 obols 4.5 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 2 obols 4 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 6 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 96 obols 26) eparourion drachmas 18 obols 4, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5 chalki 2, kollybos drachma 1, in total drachmas 59 obols 5 chalki 2;;and to Heron, son of Sokrates;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obol 3.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 3, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obol 1;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 3 obols 5.5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 4 obols 2.5;;grammateia drachma 1 obol 1 chalki 2, surcharge obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 3;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 25, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5, in total drachmas 26, obols 3.5;;Tapasion, daughter of Syros (Apolinaris Titinkes);;(in left margin: drachmas 140 obols 9)orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 19 obols 4 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obol 0.5 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 2, surcharges drachmas 4 obols 4;;eparourion drachmas 13 obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 4.5, in total drachmas 43 obols 4.5;;vineyard tax for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 7 obols 3, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 15 obol 1.5;;the eight-drachma offering to Dionysos drachmas 4, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obol 1 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 2 obols 5.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3, obols 2 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 47 obol 1.5, surcharges drachmas 3 obol 0.5, in total drachmas 52 obols 2;;geometria of the vineyard drachmas 18 obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5, in total drachmas 20."
